sections.heading: What is 〜べき?
sections.content:
〜べき expresses moral obligation , duty , or strong advice , meaning "should," "ought to," or "supposed to." It's more formal and carries a sense of what is right or proper.

約束は守るべきだ "You should keep promises" 真実を話すべきです "You ought to tell the truth"

children.heading: Pattern: Verb dictionary form + べき(だ/です)
children.content:
| Verb | + べき | | ------ | ---------- | | 行く | 行くべき | | 食べる | 食べるべき | | する | するべき | | 来る | 来るべき |

Exception: する can also be すべき

勉強するべき ✓ 勉強すべき ✓ Both mean: "should study"

children.heading: Moral advice/obligation
children.content: 正直であるべきだ "You should be honest" 健康に気をつけるべきです "You should take care of your health" 感謝の気持ちを持つべきだ "You should have a sense of gratitude"

children.heading: Social expectations
children.content: 時間を守るべきです "You should be punctual" 年上の人を敬うべきだ "You should respect your elders" 法律を守るべきです "You should obey the law"

sections.heading: べき vs Alternatives
sections.content:
| Expression | Meaning | Nuance | | ---------------- | -------------- | --------------- | | べき | Should (moral) | Duty/obligation | | ほうがいい | Had better | Personal advice | | なければならない | Must | Necessity | | たほうがいい | Should have | Past advice |

勉強するべきだ "You should study" (it's right/proper) 勉強したほうがいい "You'd better study" (practical advice) 勉強しなければならない "You must study" (necessity)

children.heading: Casual
children.content: 行くべきだ "Should go" やるべきだ "Should do"

children.heading: Polite
children.content: 行くべきです "Should go" やるべきです "Should do"

children.heading: Formal Writing
children.content: 考慮すべきである "Should be considered" 実施すべきである "Should be implemented"

children.heading: べきではない / べきでない
children.content: 嘘をつくべきではない "You shouldn't lie" 諦めるべきではありません "You shouldn't give up" 怒るべきでない "You shouldn't get angry"

children.heading: Example 1: Advice
children.content: A: 彼に謝ったほうがいいかな？ "Should I apologize to him?" B: うん、謝るべきだと思うよ "Yeah, I think you should apologize" A: そうだよね... "You're right..."

children.heading: Example 2: Discussion
children.content: A: この問題、どうすべきでしょうか？ "What should we do about this problem?" B: まず原因を調べるべきです "First, we should investigate the cause"

children.heading: Example 3: Opinion
children.content: A: もっと環境に配慮すべきだと思います "I think we should be more environmentally conscious" B: 賛成です "I agree"

children.heading: Should have done
children.content: もっと勉強するべきだった "I should have studied more" 早く言うべきでした "I should have said it earlier" 諦めるべきではなかった "I shouldn't have given up"

children.heading: べきだと思う (I think should)
children.content: 謝るべきだと思います "I think you should apologize" 行くべきだと思う "I think you should go"

children.heading: べきか (whether should)
children.content: 行くべきかどうか迷っています "I'm wondering whether I should go" 何をすべきか分かりません "I don't know what I should do"

children.heading: べきではないか (shouldn't we?)
children.content: もっと努力すべきではないか "Shouldn't we try harder?" 考え直すべきではないでしょうか "Shouldn't we reconsider?"

children.heading: Moral actions
children.content: 守るべき - should protect/keep 従うべき - should obey/follow 尊重すべき - should respect 考えるべき - should think/consider

children.heading: Social duties
children.content: 謝るべき - should apologize 感謝すべき - should be grateful 努力すべき - should make effort 反省すべき - should reflect

children.heading: Decisions
children.content: 決めるべき - should decide 選ぶべき - should choose 行動すべき - should act 変えるべき - should change

children.heading: Formal documents/essays
children.content: 政府は対策を取るべきである "The government should take measures" 我々は環境を守るべきだ "We should protect the environment" 教育を重視すべきである "Education should be prioritized"

children.heading: 〜べきですか？
children.content: 今すぐ行くべきですか？ "Should I go right now?" 何をすべきでしょうか？ "What should I do?" どちらを選ぶべきですか？ "Which should I choose?"

children.heading: Mistake 1: Confusing with ほうがいい
children.content: べき = moral should (what's right) ほうがいい = practical had better (advice) Context matters!

children.heading: Mistake 2: Using べき too casually
children.content: Too strong: 早く寝るべきだよ ⚠️ Better: 早く寝たほうがいいよ ✓ "You should sleep early" べき can sound preachy in casual contexts!

children.heading: Mistake 3: Wrong form
children.content: Wrong: 行くべきない ❌ Right: 行くべきではない ✓ "Shouldn't go"

children.heading: Adding emphasis
children.content: 絶対に諦めるべきではない "You absolutely shouldn't give up" 必ず守るべきです "You must definitely keep it" 当然やるべきだ "You should naturally do it"

children.heading: Basic
children.content: 約束は守るべきです "You should keep promises" 嘘をつくべきではない "You shouldn't lie" 健康に気をつけるべきだ "You should take care of your health"

children.heading: Intermediate
children.content: もっと真剣に将来のことを考えるべきだと思います "I think you should think more seriously about your future" この問題について話し合うべきではないでしょうか "Shouldn't we discuss this problem?" 彼に謝るべきだったと後悔しています "I regret that I should have apologized to him"

children.heading: Advanced
children.content: 社会の一員として、責任を持って行動すべきである "As a member of society, one should act responsibly" 環境保護のために、私たち全員が努力すべきだと考えます "I believe we all should make an effort for environmental protection" 過去の失敗から学び、同じ過ちを繰り返すべきではない "We should learn from past failures and not repeat the same mistakes"

sections.heading: Related Grammar Points
sections.content: 〜ほうがいい - Had better 〜なければならない - Must 〜べきではない - Shouldn't 〜べきだった - Should have Obligation expressions - Various must/should forms
